hero.title: Our Impact in Action
hero.subtitle: See the tangible difference we're making together. Every donation, every volunteer hour, every program participant contributes to measurable positive change in communities worldwide.

focusAreas.title: Our Focus Areas
focusAreas.subtitle: We tackle environmental challenges through four interconnected focus areas, each designed to create lasting, measurable impact.

stories.title: Success Stories
stories.subtitle: Real stories of transformation and hope from communities we've had the privilege to work alongside. These are the faces and places behind our impact numbers.

awards.title: Recognition & Awards
awards.subtitle: Our impact has been recognized by leading environmental and social impact organizations.

transparency.title: Transparency & Accountability
transparency.subtitle: We believe in complete transparency. Every dollar donated, every project completed, and every person impacted is tracked and reported.

cards.title: Financial Transparency
cards.body: 98% of donations go directly to programs. Complete financial reports available quarterly.

cards.title: Impact Measurement
cards.body: Every project includes clear metrics and regular impact assessments by third parties.

cards.title: Community Voice
cards.body: Regular surveys and feedback from program participants ensure we're meeting real needs.

cta.title: Be Part of Our Impact Story
cta.subtitle: Your support helps us continue creating measurable positive change. Join thousands of donors who are making a real difference in communities worldwide.
